\" Narcotics detectives work under cover in a chicken joint to try and bust a gang of organized criminals. Things take an unexpected turn when their new recipe suddenly transforms the run-down restaurant into the hottest eatery in town. \"

\" A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend. \"

\" A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris. \"

A definitive comedy that appeals to the taste of Koreans
A New Sense of Korean Action Movies

\'Ja-yoon\' lost all her memories after escaping alone from a facility where a mysterious accident occurred 10 years ago. She grew up to be a strong and bright high school girl under the care of an elderly couple who took care of herself and raised her without knowing her age or name. Ja-yoon appeared in an audition program with a prize money to help with her difficult family situation. Right after the broadcast aired, mysterious figures appeared in front of her. Ja-yoon is thrown into confusion with the appearance of \'Scion\', a man who hovers around Ja-yoon and keeps a keen eye on her, and \'Doctor Baek\' and \'Mr. It works...! Everything changed after they appeared.

Three friends, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stew (Ed Helms), and Alan (Jack Garifianakis), who had a terrible hangover in Las Vegas two years ago. Due to the disaster at that time, the trio go to Thailand to attend the wedding of \'Stew\', who broke off his fiancée and met a new girlfriend. Promising not to repeat the previous nightmare, I drank \‘just one drink\’… I woke up in a hurry and woke up to Bangkok! The \‘Again. Again. Again\’ film cut!! Alan\'s hair was shaved off, a dazzling tattoo on Stu\'s face, all that was left was a monkey wearing a cute vest, lewd matsutake mushrooms (?), and a finger from the bride\'s sister! what the hell happened last night? Somehow, this time I feel like I\'m going to suffer from an even tougher \'Hangover\'?!
A comedy without hesitation, a sequel that never tires
A series of deja vu. Applause for Kim Da-mi\'s excavation

\‘La La Land\’, the city of stars for dreamers. Jazz pianist \'Sebastian\' (Ryan Gosling) and aspiring actress \'Mia\' (Emma Stone), who met at the brightest moment in their lives, begin to create an unfinished stage for each other.
Almost all the reasons we fall in love with movies are in these movies.
